in 2nd chain from the hook and each chain across the row chain 1 t 2 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 t 15 3 skip 1st single_crochet single_crochet across the row chain 1 t 14 4 repeat row 3 13 5 repeat row 3 12 6 repeat row 3 11 7 repeat row 3 10 8 repeat row 3 9 9 work even chain 1 and without turning single_crochet in same stitch again single_crochet in 9 edge stitch from each row all the way down the side of the cape *single_crochet in corner stitch chain 1 then single_crochet in same stitch again* before moving to the bottom of the cape single_crochet in each single_crochet along the bottom and repeat from * to * in next corner stitch single_crochet in each edge stitch from each row all the way up the other side of the cape when you get to the last row chain 15 slip_stitch to join the other side of the cape at neck level bind off and weave in the ends slip the cape over buster s head when you are finished with him page 6 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com putting it all together all the pieces laid out together sew the head to the body by sewing each stitch in the head to each stitch in the body they should line up perfectly sew on
